speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report by Hélène Flautre, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, on the evaluation of EU sanctions as part of the EU’s actions and policies in the area of human rights ( 2008/2031(INI) ) ( A6-0309/2008 ).
original: President. − The next item is the report by Hélène Flautre, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, on the evaluation of EU sanctions as part of the EU’s actions and policies in the area of human rights ( 2008/2031(INI) ) ( A6-0309/2008 ).
agenda_item: Evaluation of EU sanctions as part of the EU's actions and policies in the area of human rights (debate)
